channel.title: Quite an odd request.. Slow Hoster?
channel.description:
I need a free VPS or host. I need some kind of server that is free. I don't really care if it's 10MHz or 5KBPs or 32MB of RAM, I need it to work, with a little hard drive space. No, I'm not trying to host a runescape private server, I'm trying to host something that I made that does some server work.
A fast VPS or host is not neccesary, my game server will require almost no CPU Usage, and little internet speed. lots of RAM isn't needed either.
Just wondering if there is such thing anymore.

item.title: Quite an odd request.. Slow Hoster?
item.dc:creator: @error.login cane
item.description:
@error.login wrote:

you can run anything on a vps, private servers, web pages everything. and you can pay by paypal

Read full topic
item.source: Quite an odd request.. Slow Hoster?

item.title: Quite an odd request.. Slow Hoster?
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“error.login, post:7, topic:175935”][quote author=bowserjr2 link=topic=236606.msg2016007#msg2016007 date=1201384969]

I found a hoster, they’re glad to help me with my project. Thanks for the ideas.

Where do you find it?
It want one to, thanks if you help me.
[/quote]
bowser i can get you a good vps host half price, but are you willing to wait like a month? the url is
http://xtendhosting.com/low-cost-uk-vps-servers.php i can get them half price for you.[/quote]
Thank you for the help, but I have no Credit Card, so I cant pay.

But is that possible to run programs like Bots on a VPS, I do not mean Scar.

Read full topic

item.title: Quite an odd request.. Slow Hoster?
item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

Try asking in IRC a few people have access to dedis etc. but it’s unlikely you’ll get help tbh.

Otherwise make friends with someone who has one and ask them in a couple of weeks after asslicking

Read full topic
item.source: Quite an odd request.. Slow Hoster?

item.title: Quite an odd request.. Slow Hoster?
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

You might be able to get a free shell account, you usually have to tell them a little bit about what you’re doing with it and get accepted.

You won’t find a free VPS unless somebody is very very kind.

Read full topic
